Layer.OnCommand:
%function(self) local function rgba(r,g,b,a) r=r/255 g=g/255 b=b/255 a=a
return r,g,b,a end self:zoomx(1000); self:zoomy(300); self:y(-100); self:diffusebottomedge(rgba(110, 194, 252,1)) self:diffusetopedge(rgba(149, 246, 255,1)); end

%function(self)
local function rgba(r,g,b,a) r=r/255 g=g/255 b=b/255 a=a
return r,g,b,a end self:customtexturerect(.8,.5,2.8,2.5) self:texcoordvelocity(.2,0) self:diffuse(rgba(66, 147, 152,1)) self:croptop(.2) self:cropbottom(.2) self:zoomy(.5) self:zoomx(3) self:rotationz(20) self:xy(0,130) end

%function(self)
local function rgba(r,g,b,a) r=r/255 g=g/255 b=b/255 a=a
return r,g,b,a end self:customtexturerect(.8,.5,2.8,2.5) self:texcoordvelocity(.2,0) self:diffuse(rgba(66, 147, 152,1)) self:croptop(.2) self:cropbottom(.2) self:zoomy(1) self:zoomx(3) self:rotationz(20) self:xy(0,150) end

%function(self)
local function rgba(r,g,b,a) r=r/255 g=g/255 b=b/255 a=a
return r,g,b,a end self:customtexturerect(.8,.5,2.8,2.5) self:texcoordvelocity(-.2,0) self:diffuse(rgba(56, 130, 143,1)) self:croptop(.2) self:cropbottom(.2) self:cropright(.1) self:zoomy(.4) self:zoomx(2) self:rotationz(-10) self:xy(0,100) end

%function(self) self:customtexturerect(.5,.5,2.5,2.5) self:texcoordvelocity(.2,0) self:diffuse(63/255, 141/255, 153/255,1) self:croptop(.2) self:cropbottom(.2) self:zoomy(.44) self:zoomx(2) self:rotationz(20) self:xy(0,75) end

%function(self) self:customtexturerect(.5,.5,2.5,2.5) self:texcoordvelocity(.2,0) self:diffuse(63/255, 141/255, 153/255,1) self:croptop(.2) self:cropright(.45) self:cropbottom(.2) self:zoomy(.44) self:zoomx(2) self:rotationz(-20) self:xy(0,80) end

%function(self)
local function rgba(r,g,b,a) r=r/255 g=g/255 b=b/255 a=a
return r,g,b,a end self:customtexturerect(.8,.5,2.8,2.5) self:texcoordvelocity(.2,0) self:diffuse(rgba(66, 133, 149,1)) self:croptop(.2) self:cropbottom(.2) self:cropleft(.4) self:zoomy(.3) self:zoomx(3) self:rotationz(20) self:xy(0,10) end
%function(self) self:customtexturerect(.5,.5,2.5,2.5) self:texcoordvelocity(.2,0) self:diffuse(63/255, 141/255, 153/255,1) self:croptop(.2) self:cropbottom(.2) self:zoomy(.5) self:zoomx(4) end

%function(self) self:wag() self:effectmagnitude(0,0,10) self:effectclock('bgm') self:effectperiod(16) self:effectoffset(3) self:xy(-200,0) self:zoom(.8)
end
%function(self) self:zoom(1) self:xy(15,-30) self:bob() self:effectmagnitude(10,0,0) self:effectclock('bgm') self:effectoffset(13) self:effectperiod(16) end

%function(self) self:wag() self:effectmagnitude(0,0,10) self:effectclock('bgm') self:effectperiod(32) self:effectoffset(10) self:xy(200,0) self:zoom(1)
end
%function(self) self:zoom(1) self:xy(15,-30) self:bob() self:effectmagnitude(0,8,0) self:effectclock('bgm') self:effectoffset(4) self:effectperiod(16) end

%function(self) self:wag() self:effectmagnitude(0,0,5) self:effectclock('bgm') self:effectperiod(16) self:xy(40,50) self:zoom(.6)
end
%function(self) self:zoom(1) self:xy(30,-80) self:bob() self:effectmagnitude(30,0,0) self:effectclock('bgm') self:effectperiod(32) end

%function(self) self:wag() self:effectmagnitude(0,0,5) self:effectclock('bgm') self:effectperiod(16) self:effectoffset(7) self:xy(-50,70) self:zoom(.7)
end
%function(self) self:zoom(1) self:xy(-40,-105) self:bob() self:effectmagnitude(0,20,0) self:effectclock('bgm') self:effectoffset(4) self:effectperiod(32) end
